message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice,  $15,000 is significantly more than I'm willing to pay.  I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $8,000 at this time. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a very strong offer, and I believe it reflects the value you'll gain from the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to offer $10,000.  It's a fair price, and I'm confident we can both benefit from this deal.
